NewsArticle.Title: The Second Battle
NewsArticle.Content:
"Scattered Dark Aislings from the First Battle have gathered once again at the Battle Fields. We request that all willing and able Aislings come help fight."
Dealos
((This battle will last all weekend. Also, Violet, the descendant of the legendary armorer will be able to repair/replace your Grand Armor. Simply say the name of the legendary armorer.))
